original_text: When the people move to another place, the Levites must pack the Tent. When the people arrive at a new place, the Levites must put the Tent up again. If any other person, not a Levite, comes near to the special Tent, they must die.
korean_text: 성막을 운반할 때에는 레위인이 그것을 걷고 성막을 세울 때에는 레위인이 그것을 세울 것이요 외인이 가까이 오면 죽일지며

sentences.original_text: When the people move to another place
the Levites must pack the Tent
When the people arrive at a new place
the Levites must put the Tent up again
If any other person, not a Levite
comes near to the special Tent
